command_start: Hello! I am a cleaning bot, I remove all users from the chat/channel blacklist. To clear blacklist, just add me to chat as admin with the right to ban users.
successfully_cleared:
Chat blacklist has been successfully cleared. 
Count of removed users from blacklist: {count}
bot_need_ban_right: Bot must be added as admin with the right to ban users.
blacklist_is_empty: The chat blacklist is empty. Nobody unbanned.
